name: Science Puzzle - Force of Gravity
description:
Science Puzzle [Force of Gravity]

This simulation is a small play-ground where you can define gravity as you wish.

The results may blow up the planet, things can go wrong and whatnot.

Along the way you might find the right formula or even discover physics laws never heard of.

How to Play:

  • Follow the steps seen in the menu at the top left side of the screen.
  • Press the Run button to start.
  • In Step 3 and Step 4;
    • The  code section is editable.
    • Drag and drop tools on white regions to create your force formula.
    • Also click on tools to edit numbers and calculation operators.

Try to obtain 12 checks in the Data Table.

Good luck! 🤓
